# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 2.x     | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.x     | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please send an e-mail to authors specified in the [composer.json](https://github.com/opis/json-schema/blob/master/composer.json) file.
